ED_Title: Rights  of reply to addresses by Heads of State
ED_DecisionText: At its 2nd plenary meeting, on 17 September 2021, the General Assembly took note of the information provided in paragraph 52 of the report of the General Committee (A/76/250) concerning rights of reply to addresses by Heads of State.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the main part of the session will be contained in document A/76/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
